explanation: [0-0] On an unpaved road, a man wearing a green shirt and black trousers sits on the ground, operating a simple knife sharpener powered by a bicycle chain. He pedals with his feet to provide power to the grinding stone. Another man places a large machete against the rotating grinding stone and begins sharpening. The ground is grey. There is a "DON TECH HD" caption at the bottom of the screen, along with a white watermark.

[0-7] The man in green pulls the chain to power the wheel as the other man holds the machete against the wheel for sharpening. The shot changes to a different angle, showing a close-up of the sharpening process. The rotation of the grinding stone and the shape of the machete are more clearly visible. The man sharpening the machete moves it carefully, ensuring the edge is evenly ground.
